g++  -g -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -Wextra -Werror -Wconversion -Wno-unused-parameter -Wold-style-cast -Woverloaded-virtual -Wpointer-arith -Wshadow -Wwrite-strings -march=native -rdynamic -O0  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/buffer_unittest.dir/Buffer_unittest.cc.o  -o ../../../bin/buffer_unittest ../../../lib/libmuduo_net.a -lboost_unit_test_framework ../../../lib/libmuduo_base.a -lpthread -lrt
